text: Aspidolasius is a genus of South American orb-weaver spiders containing the single species, Aspidolasius branicki. It was first described by Eugène Simon in 1887, and has been found in Colombia, Bolivia, Guyana, and Brazil. ==References== Category:Araneidae Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of South America Category:Taxa named by Eugène Simon
title: Aspidolasius
